Player History
Earned first career win on 4/14/1985...
Had first career hit on 8/10/1985, off Don Aase (ATL)...
10/10/1985: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $5,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
Traded from New York (M) to Seattle on 2/5/1987 (Going to SEA: P Jesse Orosco. Going to NYM: C Dave Valle, LF Mickey Brantley)...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
5/26/1989: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $1,740,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 5/29/1990 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/14/1990 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/9/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
